modName: Nameless Light by FavoredSoul DSR Patch
summary: A simple patch for a sword so it can be seen at the back of your Character with Dual Sheath Redux mod. sword made by FlavoredSoul
descriptionHtml:
Original Mod Page: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83830/?]Nameless Light by FavoredSoul
[/url]DSR: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux By Neovalen[/url]

Install with Any Mod Managers Then Delete the old DSR Patch then Re-Run Jar FilePatcher it so the new patch will be added. Doesn't have Scabbards or Sheaths Included unless the original author of the mod wants to make me one.Compatible with HDT Equipment too!
Enjoy!
author: Jeffhubert113
